title: Emma Watson Beauty and the Beast Instagram Photo March 2017 Entertainment
text:
A post shared by Emma Watson (@emmawatson) on Mar 17, 2017 at 3:49am PDT
Beauty and the Beast opens this weekend, and Emma Watson is just as excited as we are. The actress, who is playing Belle in the live-action adaptation , posted a sweet behind-the-scenes photo on Friday to celebrate the occasion. "@beautyandthebeast opens today," she wrote. "I hope you have as much fun watching it as I did making it. Love, Emma ðŸŒ¹" Dressed in the iconic yellow gown from the ballroom scene, she is seen doing her best princess twirl as she poses for the camera. After watching all the trailers and playing the songs on repeat , we can't wait to see the film finally come to life.
